sentences.en: A bad result is sure to throw a spanner in the works.
sentences.cn: 糟糕的成绩肯定会坏事的。

sentences.en: Elgar supplied his works with precise indications of tempo.
sentences.cn: 埃尔加给自己的作品标上了精确的节奏标记。

sentences.en: He works backwards, building a house from the top downwards.
sentences.cn: 他把工序倒过来了，从上往下建房子。

sentences.en: He works obsessively from 7.15 am to 9 or 10 at night.
sentences.cn: 他工作极为投入，会从早上七点一刻一直干到晚上九十点。

sentences.en: Her colourful oils and works on paper have a naive, dreamlike quality.
sentences.cn: 她那些色彩斑斓的油画与纸上作品给人一种天真、梦幻般的感觉。

sentences.en: In some works, flowers take on a powerful emblematic quality.
sentences.cn: 在一些作品中，花具有强烈的象征意义。

sentences.en: James works as assistant chef at a fast food restaurant.
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯在一家快餐店当助理厨师。

sentences.en: Now his other major works are creeping back into concert programmes.
sentences.cn: 现在他的其他主要作品又悄然出现在音乐会节目单上。

sentences.en: The house is crammed with priceless furniture and works of art.
sentences.cn: 房子里摆满了昂贵的家具和艺术品。

sentences.en: The trio are part of Sotheby's sale of Works of Art.
sentences.cn: 该三件套是苏富比艺术品拍卖会上的一件拍品。

sentences.en: The video explains in simple terms how the new tax works.
sentences.cn: 录像用简单易懂的语言解释了新税法。

sentences.en: There is another drug called DHE that works in a similar fashion.
sentences.cn: 另外还有一种叫DHE的药物，药效也差不多。

sentences.en: There's a lack of fussiness about the way he works.
sentences.cn: 他工作时不会过分注重细节。

sentences.en: This obviously works against the interests of the child.
This works through the mediation of the central nervous system.
sentences.cn: 这是通过中枢神经系统的调节作用实现的。

phrases.tran_cn: 排水工程；渠务工程；排水工作
工程建筑物；机器制造厂
防洪工程；洪水控制结构物；城市防洪工程

trans.tran_cn: [机] 工厂，工场，工程，所有的事物，全套物品，作为（ work的名词复数 ）
（使）工作（ work的第三人称单数 ），（使）运作，运转，（使）产生效果
